purpleculture_pinyin:
miàn
flour; noodles; (of food) soft (not crunchy); (slang) (of a person) ineffectual; spineless
мука; лапша; (еды) мягкий (не хрустящий); (сленг) (человека) неэффективен; бесхребетный

Ru_trainchinese: miàn: (сущ/прил) лапша; мука, пшеничная мука; порошок; (диал.) мягкий и рыхлый
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When I come face-to-face with some buckwheat noodles I can't help but to chow down.
humanum_full_description_en:
Same as " noodle ", from the sound of "麦" and "丏", the original meaning is flour. "Said Wen": "Mai Mo Ye. From the wheat, the sound." Tang Zhang said "Fenghe Xixue Yingzhi": "Accumulate like sand and illuminate the moon, scattered like the face from the wind."

" Noodles " can refer to pasta and noodles. "Southern History•The Passage of Yiqian•Gaochangguo": "Prepare nine valleys, and many people eat noodles and beef and mutton."

" Noodle " also refers to powder. "Song History‧Five Elements Four": "In March of the Seventh Year of Jiayou, Baihe Township, Pengcheng County was born."
humanum_short_description_en: Same as " noodle ", from the sound of "麦" and "丏", the original meaning is flour.
humanum_full_description:
同「麪」，從「麥」，「 丏」聲，本義為麵粉。《說文》：「麥末也。从麥，丏聲。」唐張說〈奉和喜雪應制〉：「積如沙照月，散似麵從風。」

　　「麵」可指麵食、麵條。《南史‧夷貊傳下‧高昌國》：「備植九穀，人多噉麵及牛羊肉。」

　　「麵」也指粉狀物。《宋史‧五行志四》：「嘉祐七年三月，彭城縣白鶴鄉地生麵。」
humanum_short_description: 同「麪」，從「麥」，「 丏」聲，本義為麵粉。

mian4
HSK 1: 面,麵
麵麵RS
麺麺 		麪 麵 flour, dough, noodles
  • grain 麥/麦 in a form it can be eaten by a mouth 面
(Simplified: 面)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 背
Pictophonetic: 麥 indicates the sound; 面 (face) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 麥 [ mài ] wheat, barley, oats
    • 面 [ miàn ] face; surface, side; plane, dimension
①頭的前部，臉：臉面。顏面。面目。面面相覷。
②用臉對着，向着：面對。面壁(ａ．面對着牆；b．佛教指面對牆壁靜坐修行)。
③事物的外表：地面。面友(表面的、非真心相交的朋友)。面額(票面的數額)。
④方位，部分：前面。反面。片面。全面。多面手。
⑤量詞，多用於扁平的物件：一面鼓。
⑥會見，直接接頭的：當面。面議。面晤。耳提面命(“耳提”，提着耳朵叮囑；“面命”，當面指教，形容教誨殷切)。
⑦幾何學上指線移動所生成的形跡，有長有寬沒有厚的形：平面。曲面。
⑧糧食磨成的粉，特指小麥磨成的粉：麪粉。麪食。麪包。
⑨粉末：藥麪兒。
⑩由麪粉和水做成的條狀食物：麪條。
⑾食物含纖維少而柔軟：這種瓜很面。
⑿裏背點。

面對 [ miàn duì ]: to confront; to face
面積 [ miàn jī ]: area (of a floor, piece of land etc); surface area; tract of land

同「 麪 」，從「 麥 」，「 丏」聲，本義為麵粉。《說文》：「麥末也。从麥，丏聲。」唐張說〈奉和喜雪應制〉：「積如沙照月，散似麵從風。」 「 麵 」可指麵食、麵條。《南史‧夷貊傳下‧高昌國》：「備植九穀，人多噉麵及牛羊肉。」 「 麵 」也指粉狀物。《宋史‧五行志四》：「嘉祐七年三月，彭城縣白鶴鄉地生麵。」
Same as " noodle", from the sound of " 麦" and "丏", the original meaning is flour. "Said Wen": "Mai Mo Ye. From the wheat, the sound." Tang Zhang said "Fenghe Xixue Yingzhi": "Accumulate like sand and illuminate the moon, scattered like the face from the wind." " Noodles" can refer to pasta and noodles. "Southern History•The Passage of Yiqian•Gaochangguo": "Prepare nine valleys, and many people eat noodles and beef and mutton." " Noodle" also refers to powder. "Song History‧Five Elements Four": "In March of the Seventh Year of Jiayou, Baihe Township, Pengcheng County was born."

麵字的基本解释

麵
miàn
见“面”⑧麵??。

麵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miàn］
［《廣韻》莫甸切，去霰，明。］
亦作“麫1”。亦作“麵1”。
(1)面粉。
(2)指面食，面条。
(3)指粉状物。
(4)指某些食物淀粉含量多口感绵软。

麵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【麥字部】　麵； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1514第07
【正字通】俗麪字。【齊書·禮志】永明九年正月詔，太廟四時祭，薦宣皇帝麵起餠。

麵字的源字形

["Guangyun" Mo Dian cut, go to cha, Ming. ]
Also known as "麫1". Also known as "face 1".
(1) Flour.
(2) Refers to pasta, noodles.
(3) Refers to powder.
(4) Refers to some foods with high starch content and soft taste.
